CustomField.defaultValue:
"Below is an assumption list for the NSC." + ' ' + "Unless noted in the Comments Section by a Client Services Manager, these would be protocol:" + BR() + BR() +
"• All shows will follow the IAEE Guidelines." + BR() + "• NSC will add/update Core exhibitors." + BR() + "• Discount Deadline will be extended on a case-by-case basis at the NSC discretion up to 7" + ' ' + "business days prior to GES move-in date." + BR() + "• Multiple pieces of carpet are allowed." + BR() + "• Order Entry will reach out to the customer for Dye Lots and Seams" + BR() + "• Cutoff for Specialty Furniture is 7 days of show open." + BR() + "• Cutoff for Custom Carpet 7 days of show open." + BR() + "• Exhibitors cannot exchange or swap package item(s) at no cost." + BR() + "• If part of the booth package, drape colors cannot be changed." + BR() + "• Booth cleaning is not included the day/night before show opening, unless noted." + BR() + "• If an exhibitor is ordering a 20amp service or more and do not submit a floor plan," + ' ' + "labor, and payment; they will be charged at the regular rate."
CustomField.label: Assumption List
